pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sequential Rank Agreement // Tools for analysing the agreement of two or more rankings of the same items. Examples are importance rankings of predictor variables and risk predictions of subjects. Benchmarks for agreement are computed based on random permutation and bootstrap. See Ekstrm CT, Gerds TA, Jensen, AK (2018). "Sequential rank agreement methods for comparison of ranked lists." _Biostatistics_, *20*(4), 582-598 doi:10.1093/biostatistics/kxy017 for more information.
